knimeNode.name: Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Using JUNG, this node creates a network cell for the input data correlated above a chosen threshold for each target variable.

fullDescription.intro: Builds a network, one for each row, consisting of user-specified columns which meet the chosen threshold. For instance, using this node after a Correlation Calculator can give a network of correlations which may provide biological insight. The network can be saved in GraphML format or opened in a visualisation program like Gephi or Cytoscape. For now, only graphs with a single edge between source and destination are supported: an error will be thrown if this constraint is violated. This means you must eliminate redundancy before using this node.
fullDescription.option: Source object name eg. gene or protein. Any string column may be chosen, best if it is short eg. <20 characters
Destination object name eg. gene or protein. Any string column may be chosen, best if it is short
Specify the distance eg. R-squared value between source and destination. Any numeric column may be chosen.
